wrote: 
Will attempt to send all of them via email. Sorry for the quality. Should be 11 emails. This is ttl. Corresponds to the 
following transcript passage in the pros memo (with some additional time before and after): 
Q: Did you ever give a massage to anyone other than Mr. Epstein at any of Mr. Epstein's properties? 
A: First of all, I never said I gave Mr. Epstein a massage. 
CI: I will ask that question if you want, but I was focusing on people other than Mr. Epstein right now. 
A: I don't give massages. 
CI: Let's just tie that down. Is it your testimony that you've never given anybody a massage? 
A: I have not given anyone a massage. 
CI: You never gave Mr. Epstein a massage, is that your testimony? 
A: That is my testimony. 
CI: 
You never gave a massage is your testimony? 
A: I never gave a massage. 
<clip I.MOV> 
EFTA00018542
